RuleSet.Name: src/schema/buff/SchemaBuffTableDefaultFactory.java
RuleSet.Descr: Java 21 Default Factory implementation for $TableName$ buffers

GenFile.Name: fileSchemaBuffTableDefaultFactoryJava
GenFile.BasePackageName: $reference ManufacturingSchema lower JavaPackage$.$reference ManufacturingSchema lower SchemaName$/src/main/java
GenFile.SubPackageName: $reference ManufacturingSchema lower JavaPackage$.$reference ManufacturingSchema lower SchemaName$.buff

RuleSet.GenRule: $switch HasSuperClassRelation no implBuffNewPKey default empty$$switch HasSuperClassRelation no maybeImplBuffNewHPKey default empty$$iterate Index( each implBuffNewNonPrimaryIndexKey )$$implBuffNewRec$$switch BaseHasHistory yes implBuffNewHRec default empty$
